https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ptRQjIZ1qJzkOoj8YD2uvk1sZ7b.jpg Natasha, a Russian refuge, seeks a place in the Greek sun. She learns speaking Greek using audio cassettes. Finally, she learns the lesson of life. A Bright Shining Sun
